name: 202579S02 Rev1 - Stormwater Pond CQA Plan Checklist
template name: 202579S02 Rev1 - Stormwater Pond CQA Plan Checklist

name: 1.1 - Site Preparation and Earthworks Inspection and Test Plan Checklist
SE1 - Contractor to provide WHS Plan and SEDMP
Timing - At least 10 days prior to commencing the works
SE2 - Superintendent to review WHS Plan and SEDMP (HOLD POINT H-SE1)
Reporting Form - Written confirmation of acceptance
SE3 - GTA’s approval of Subgrade Fill materials proposed to be used in the works (HOLD POINT H-SE2)
SE4 - Environmental Consultant to approve of imported subgrade fill materials (if applicable)
Timing - Prior to subgrade filling works
Acceptance Criteria - Meeting Environmental Consultants approval
SE5 - Proof rolling of existing subgrade surface areas (HOLD POINT H-SE3)
Timing - Prior to commencement of filling
Reporting Form - Written confirmation of acceptance
SE6 - All subgrade testing shall be performed at a rate determined by the GTA in accordance with the Specification.
Reporting Form - GTA test and inspection documentation
SE8 - CQA Engineer to review and approve as constructed information (HOLD POINT H-SE4)
Timing - Prior to placement of subsequent layers
Reporting Form - Written confirmation of acceptance
